thread.title: Just 17 Of Bo Obama's Cutest Moments In Office
thread.title_full: Just 17 Of Bo Obama's Cutest Moments In Office

author: Bob Marshall
title: Just 17 Of Bo Obama's Cutest Moments In Office
text:
View this image ›
The White House / Getty Images ID: 10345655 2. It didn’t take long for President Obama and Bo to become close friends. View this image ›
The White House / Getty Images ID: 10345662 3. And he was the perfect puppy for Sasha and Malia. View this image ›
Chip Somodevilla / Getty Images ID: 10345678 4. Baby Bo’s first press conference went without a hitch, and it was immediately clear that he would be a very good boy for the rest of his time in office. View this image ›
Chip Somodevilla / Getty Images ID: 10345685 5. Between their busy work schedules, Bo and Barack always found time to hang out and throw the ol’ football around. View this image ›
The White House / Getty Images ID: 10345694 6. In fact, no matter what season it was, Bo could be seen enjoying the great outdoors. View this image ›
Mandel Ngan / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10345739 7. And he was always the life of the party. View this image ›
Handout / Getty Images ID: 10345729 8. While Bo and Michelle enjoyed their long walks around the White House lawn… View this image ›
Pool / Getty Images ID: 10345718 9. …he did have a reputation for keeping her on her toes from time to time. View this image ›
Jim Watson / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10345787 10. During his time in office, Bo made various public appearances, whether it was joining Michelle for a visit to the Children’s National Medical Center… View this image ›
Alex Wong / Getty Images ID: 10345885 11. …or reading excerpts from Chicka Chicka Boom Boom during the annual White House Easter Egg Roll. View this image ›
Pool / Getty Images ID: 10345912 12. Bo truly held his office in high regard. He served as a constant source of comfort for POTUS. View this image ›
Pool / Getty Images ID: 10345924 13. He was a fiercely loyal companion to Sasha and Malia. View this image ›
Saul Loeb / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10345942 14. And he was warmhearted and affectionate to strangers. Upon meeting his new sister, Sunny, Bo welcomed her with open paws. View this image ›
Handout / Getty Images ID: 10345947 15. The pair quickly became an unstoppable duo, whether it was rolling out the orange carpet for Halloween… View this image ›
Saul Loeb / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10345962 16. …or becoming the inspirations for some of the White House’s annual larger-than-life holiday decorations. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @whitehouse ID: 10346324 17. For his seven years as first pup, thanks, Bo Obama! View this image ›
The White House / Getty Images ID: 10345824 Love dogs? Sign up for our “Dog a Day” newsletter and we’ll send you an adorable pup every day!
View this embed ›
